long.ar:
Spark youtube adblock is an adblock solution for Youtube. This extension that will allow you to escape all kinds of those annoying banners, video ads, and pre-rolls.
The main features are:
‚≠ê This app is super easy to use.
‚≠ê Allows your browser to load faster.
‚≠ê Blocks all kinds of annoying ads.
This extension blocks ads before they are downloaded.
Download this app now and enjoy your ad-free time!

long.en,en_AU,en_US:
Spark Blocker is an adblocker for Youtube. This extension that will allow you to escape all kinds of those annoying banners, video ads, pre-rolls, and annotations.

UPD: Our software has been updated to reflect the most recent changes on YouTube, ensuring compatibility and smooth operation. Thoroughly tested in October 2023, this upgrade is a reliable solution for your needs.

The main features are:
‚≠ê This app is super easy to use.
‚≠ê Allows your browser to load faster.
‚≠ê Blocks all kinds of annoying ads.
‚≠ê Blocks cards (also known as annotations) - pop-up panels in videos used to link to other content or provide information to viewers.

This extension blocks ads before they are downloaded.
Download this app now and enjoy your ad-free time!
